name: elms-workspace
description: Educational Learning Management System - Complete Workspace Runner

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mobile" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --no-spinner
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" --no-spinner
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:backend" "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:mobile" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold"
scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile-app && echo 'Mobile app uses Expo - no build needed for development'
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:mobile" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold"
scripts.lint: concurrently "npm run lint:backend" "npm run lint:frontend" "npm run lint:mobile" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold"
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:push && npm run db:generate
scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install" "cd mobile-app && npm install" --names "ROOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgYellow.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold"
scripts.clean: concurrently "npm run clean:backend" "npm run clean:frontend" "npm run clean:mobile" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,MOBILE" --prefix name --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold"
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && npx rimraf dist node_modules/.vite
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && npx rimraf dist dist-electron node_modules/.vite

author: ELMS Team
